attributes.action: Ban the import of illegally felled wood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An area the size of England, Scotland and Wales, (50 million acres), is being destroyed every year. The vast majority of this is illegal.   Currently there are no legal sanctions at either EU or UK level for importing and possessing illegally logged timber.   As much as a quarter of the wood imported into the UK comes from illegal sources.
The results of this behaviour are:
The negation of reductions in industrial emissions acheived elswhere through Kyoto Protocol.
Deforestation responsible for fifth of worldwide carbon emissions.
Loss of biodiversity.
Environmental damage.
Loss of livelihood for local people and human rights abuses.
